title: DaveF
author: DaveF
created_time: December 31, 2022, 05:04:20 PMLast edit: January 02, 2023, 07:45:32 PM by DaveF
content: Provident Metals Black Horse Of Famine 1 Oz Round .999 Silver $2 a spotFree for others thanks to minerjones https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5432532.msg61525092#msg61525092I can only ship to US addressesTickets: 1- xSlyy2- WhyFhy3- Thiago007 4- geophphreigh5- PeakDK6- doblezero7- DirtyBirdE 8- krogoth9- Cassious0- The_Crypto_Kida- Spoki51b- polymerbit c- MMoparMiningLLLCd- aoluaine- owlcatzf- KryptowerkHow To Play:Use the current PREEV rate for $2 and send $2 per ticket to:BTC payment address: 3EiXpW9WrrmTdX86nsYHaTSeRMGUy4ab8DPick one of the available tickets from the table above. Post a reply with your pick and txid.The last character in the hash of a later chosen block will decide who has the winning ticket. No limit to the number of spots you can take.Shipping included but, as I said above I can only ship to US addresses.
